<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Unity](/Spells.aspx?ID=1801)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 375 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** You and 1 or more allies within range are targeted by a spell or ability that allows a saving throw

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** each ally targeted by the triggering spell
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You put up a united defense. Each ally can use your saving throw modifier instead of its own against the triggering spell. Each ally decides individually which modifier to use.
name: Unity
